data.title: R. Alan Spalding Obituary 2011
data.meta_description: Funeral services will be 11 AM Wednesday at Four Mile Run Christian Church for R. Alan "Al" Spalding Sr. who passed away Sunday at Northside Medical Center. Al was born January...
data.text: Funeral services will be 11 AM Wednesday at Four Mile Run Christian Church for R. Alan “Al” Spalding Sr. who passed away Sunday at Northside Medical Center. Al was born January 25, 1934 in Churchill, OH a son of the late Robert L. and Janet (MacLellan) Spalding. A United States Army Veteran, he was a mechanic for General Electric for 32 years retiring in 1994. He was a 65 year member of the Four Mile Run Christian Church and served as elder, Sunday school teacher, and trustee. He was instrumental in the planning and completion of the new building at the church and also served on the Benevolence Committee. In his spare time, Al enjoyed fishing, gardening, traveling and most of all helping others. He will be sadly missed by his wife, the former Marjory Glover, whom he married September 9, 1955; four children: Laurie (Tom) Dillon of Mineral Ridge, Lynn (Bill) Sarver of Tampa, FL, Bob (Diane) Spalding of North Lima and Becky (Joe) Pieleck of Stow; one brother Phil (Carol) Spalding of Austintown and eight grandchildren: Jeffrey Mikolay, Billy Sarver, Daniel Sarver, Matthew Sarver, Natalie Spalding, Briana Spalding, Sarah Spalding, and Julia Spalding. Memorial contributions may be made to the Four Mile Run Christian Church, 701 N. Four Mile Run Rd, Austintown, OH 44515 or the Second Harvest Food Bank, 2805 Salt Springs Rd., Youngstown, OH 44509, in Al’s name. Friends may call from 9 AM until 11 AM Wednesday at Four Mile Run Christian Church. Arrangements have been entrusted to Lane Funeral Home Austintown Chapel.
